content: each double_crochet to next chain-2 space repeat from * to * once double_crochet in each remaining double_crochet end with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 from this point on do not turn work skirt round 1 chain 3 skip 1 st shell skip 1 st * double_crochet skip 1 st shell skip 1 st repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 14 shells round 2 chain 3 shell in center double_crochet of shell * double_crochet shell in center double_crochet of next shell repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch as before switch to larger hook rnds 3 7 repeat row 2 rnds 8 9 chain 4 shell in center double_crochet of next shell chain 1 * double_crochet chain 1 shell chain 1 repeat from * around ending as before fasten yarn picot edging chain 1 single_crochet in same space single_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space around working picot in center double_crochet of each shell sleeve edging attach pastel pink yarn in chain-2 space at back of right sleeve single_crochet in same space * skip 1 st shell skip 1 st single_crochet repeat from * 3 times 4 shells work 3 single_crochet evenly across underarm fasten yarn repeat for left sleeve starting at chain-2 space at front of sleeve neck and back opening edging attach pastel pink yarn to neck at top of left back row 1 single_crochet in same space work single_crochet evenly across neck making a decrease in each base chain of the first row s increases 4 decrease single_crochet evenly down right back working two chain-3 buttonholes single_crochet evenly up left back ending with slip_stitch in first single_crochet do not turn row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same space * skip 1 st shell skip 1 st single_crochet repeat from * across end with slip_stitch in single_crochet at top of right back 8 shells fasten yarn bodice shell ruffle with right side of work facing you fold bodice at second and third row attach flamingo yarn at left back between those two row working between sts of folded row chain 1 single_crochet in same space * shell in next st single_crochet in next st repeat from * around bodice 22 shells fasten yarn weave in yarn ends sew two small buttons at left back opening weave ribbon through dcs of bodice joining row and tie in a bow © 2007 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com please do not reproduce sell or distribute this pattern by any means you may sell your finished work made from this pattern
